did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Marshall Westfall Collection of Audio-Visual Materials, 1981-1990
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Marshall Westfall Collection of Audio-Visual Materials #6329 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: WTAC Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright. Auto issues, UAW, Plant Closings, Foreign sourcing, Corporate restructuring, Job loss, Concessions
WTAC Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright. Auto issues, UAW, Plant Closings, Foreign sourcing, Corporate restructuring, Job loss, Concessions
WTAC Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright. Auto issues, UAW, Plant Closings, Foreign sourcing, Corporate restructuring, Job loss, Concessions
November 9, 1981. WXYZ, Detroit, Mi, Mike Westfall with David Newman. UAW ways of dealing with corporate restructured job loss.
WTRX, Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Pete Clawson and Victor Reuther. Corporate restructuring, UAW concessions
July 3, 1985. WTRX, Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright and Ralph Nader. GM taxes, Corporate restructuring, Job loss.
July 3, 1985. WTRX, Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright and Ralph Nader. GM taxes, Corporate restructuring, Job loss.
February 22, 1982. WFBE, Flint, MI, Mike Westfall (UAW National CERP Chairman) with Ken Cameron (GM Spokesman) and Gary Horn (UAW Local 659 CERP Chairman).
May 20, 1987. WTRX, Flint, MI, Steve Clawson with Rosemary Holland and Tom Gilbert from the Mike Westfall Committee. Concessions, Corporate restructuring.
May 20, 1987. WTRX, Flint, MI, Steve Clawson with Rosemary Holland and Tom Gilbert from the Mike Westfall Committee. Concessions, Corporate restructuring.

October 6, 1982. WFBE, Flint, MI, Worklife Special on Technology and Displacement. Karen Ror and Nancy Rosaver with Mike Westfall (Westfall Awareness Committee), Reggie Harris (GM Public Relations), and Tony Chifona (Genesee County Planning and Development.
October 9, 1985. WTRX, Flint, MI, Mike Westfall with Perry Wright and Jim Musselman (Ralph Nader staff). GM Property tax reduction.

scopecontent.p: June 17, 1984. Mike Westfall (National Westfall Awareness Committee), Dr. Robin Widgery (Prof. of Organizational Behavior, GMI), Dr. Frithjof Bergman (Head of Philosophy, U of M Ann Arbor), Dr. Richard Gull (Prof. of Philosophy, U of M Flint), and Dr. John Larson (Prof. of Management, U of M Flint).
